instanceVariables.name: DisplayName
instanceVariables.desc: Name of this NPC to display in the interface.

instanceVariables.name: HashID
instanceVariables.desc: HashID identifying this NPC on the server.

instanceVariables.name: CurDialogLine
instanceVariables.desc: Current line of dialog in the current track.

instanceVariables.name: SpeaksFirst
instanceVariables.desc: True (1) if this NPC has this first line.

instanceVariables.name: DefaultDialogTrack
instanceVariables.desc: Default track of dialog to loop back to.

instanceVariables.name: Speaking
instanceVariables.desc: True (1) when the NPC is currently speaking.

instanceVariables.name: CharID
instanceVariables.desc: Integer corresponding to this NPC's character ID in the dialogs dataset.
